recipe.title: Gingered Sake Spritzers
ingredients: 2 teaspoons Angostura bitters, or to taste
instructions: In a pitcher combine the saké, the ginger ale, and the bitters and add the lime slices. Serve the drink in tall glasses filled with ice.
